scripts.watchmanql: echo 256 | sudo tee -a /proc/sys/fs/inotify/max_user_instances && echo 32768 | sudo tee -a /proc/sys/fs/inotify/max_queued_events && echo 65536 | sudo tee -a /proc/sys/fs/inotify/max_user_watches && watchman shutdown-server
scripts.start: code . && npm run watchmanql && expo start
